instructions: Add all the dry ingredients to a large bowl.
Add all the wet ingredients to the same bowl, except the bananas.
Blend the bananas in a food processor until liquid. Do not skip, this gives air to the bread.
Grease 9 x 5 loaf pan with butter, then sprinkle a light layer of flour on all sides and bottom.
Add batter to pan and bake for 30 min, rotate, then an additional 40 to 55 min depending on preference.
